item.title: Management Processes: Changes
item.description: Change Management Manage changes to your project in a controlled and coordinated way. Avoid Scope Creep Use the Change Management tool to ensure you only implement the necessary changes to your project. Free Trial » Impact Assessment Justify each change request by performing an impact assessment in terms of time, cost and quality. Free Trial » Make better decisions Present change requests to the Change Control Board or Sponsor for their approval or rejection.
